name: lore-monorepo
description: This is the monorepo for Lore

scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.clean:group1: npm run clean:lore && npm run clean:lore-actions && npm run clean:lore-auth
scripts.clean:group2: npm run clean:lore-hook-actions && npm run clean:lore-hook-collections
scripts.clean:group3: npm run clean:lore-hook-connect && npm run clean:lore-hook-dialog && npm run clean:lore-hook-dialogs-bootstrap
scripts.clean:group4: npm run clean:lore-hook-dialogs-material-ui && npm run clean:lore-hook-models && npm run clean:lore-hook-reducers
scripts.clean:group5: npm run clean:lore-hook-redux && npm run clean:lore-hook-websockets && npm run clean:lore-hook-websockets-actioncable
scripts.clean:group6: npm run clean:lore-hook-websockets-sails && npm run clean:lore-hook-websockets-socketio && npm run clean:lore-models
scripts.clean:group7: npm run clean:lore-reducers && npm run clean:lore-websockets
scripts.clean: npm run clean:group1 && npm run clean:group2 && npm run clean:group3 && npm run clean:group4 && npm run clean:group5 && npm run clean:group6 && npm run clean:group7
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:node
scripts.test:group1: npm run test:lore && npm run test:lore-actions && npm run test:lore-auth && npm run test:lore-cli
scripts.test:group2: npm run test:lore-generate && npm run test:lore-generate-collection && npm run test:lore-generate-component
scripts.test:group3: npm run test:lore-generate-generator && npm run test:lore-generate-github && npm run test:lore-generate-model
scripts.test:group4: npm run test:lore-generate-new && npm run test:lore-generate-reducer && npm run test:lore-generate-surge
scripts.test:group5: npm run test:lore-generate-tutorial && npm run test:lore-hook-actions && npm run test:lore-hook-collections
scripts.test:group6: npm run test:lore-hook-connect && npm run test:lore-hook-dialog && npm run test:lore-hook-dialogs-bootstrap
scripts.test:group7: npm run test:lore-hook-dialogs-material-ui && npm run test:lore-hook-models && npm run test:lore-hook-reducers
scripts.test:group8: npm run test:lore-hook-redux && npm run test:lore-hook-websockets && npm run test:lore-hook-websockets-actioncable
scripts.test:group9: npm run test:lore-hook-websockets-sails && npm run test:lore-hook-websockets-socketio
scripts.test:group10: npm run test:lore-models && npm run test:lore-reducers && npm run test:lore-websockets
scripts.test: npm run test:group1 && npm run test:group2 && npm run test:group3 && npm run test:group4 && npm run test:group5 && npm run test:group6 && npm run test:group7 && npm run test:group8 && npm run test:group9 && npm run test:group9
